title: Project Descriptive Metadata Schema
description: Defines high-level project context, reusable for all datasets originating from this project.

project_identifier.description: Unique ID for the overall research project (e.g., grant number, internal lab ID). Auto-generated GUID/UUID.

project_title.description: Formal title of the overarching research project.

project_description.description: Brief summary/abstract of the project's goals, scope, and scientific question(s).

principal_investigator.description: Name, ORCID, Email, Affiliation of the lead researcher for the project/PhD student

funding_sources.description: Funder name(s) and Grant ID(s) or award numbers supporting the project.

originating_institution.description: Primary institution where the project research is conducted (e.g., University name).

originating_laboratory.description: Specific lab name or group identifier within the institution.

data_collection_method_summary.description: High-level overview of the main types of data generated/methods used (e.g., Genomics, Microscopy, Proteomics, Surveys).

project_data_storage_strategy.description: General description of planned primary storage locations/approach for project data.

project_timeline_summary.description: Key project milestones, overall start/end dates, or duration.

project_keywords.description: Keywords describing the project's broad subject area, methods, or focus for searchability.

created_by.description: User or system that created this metadata record.

last_modified_by.description: User or system that last modified this metadata record.
